title: Career trajectory protection despite reduced hours
description: Career trajectory protection despite reduced hours
content:
Scenario: Career trajectory protection despite reduced hours
    Given James's career has been derailed by caregiving
    And years of part-time work affects future employment
    When the workplace_elohim tracks career impact
    Then caregiving years should be recognized as valuable experience
    And James's skills should be valued despite reduced hours
    And career gaps should be explained as caregiving, not lack of ambition
    And future employers should understand caregiver career patterns
    And workplace should not permanently penalize caregiving years
